long_description: These Powertraveller Monkeytails charging cables provide tough, flexible and tangle-free connectivity for charging your devices via USB. Cables are compatible with iPad(R), iPhone(R), smart phones, cell phones, GPS receivers, e-readers, music players and more. Powertraveller Monkeytails charging cables are 15cm long and include 1 USB to mini USB cable, 1 USB to micro USB cable and 1 USB to Apple(R) cable.
short_description: These Powertraveller Monkeytails charging cables provide tough, flexible and tangle-free connectivity for charging your devices via USB.
